Features.title: 1. Establish your objectives
Features.text: We start on by assessing the success factors. We create a plan that gives us indications of the success and failure. We decide thresholds for the performance levels of your needs with estimates of changes.

Features.title: 2. Define plan
Features.text: We plan your system with implementation and migration. You need to ensure the system will work, is secure and delivers on what you need now and down the road.

Features.title: 3. Deliver, test and monitor
Features.text: Beyond delivery, automated and integrated testing is needed with human testing. The monitoring needs to look for issues you have now. learned lessons from other clients and alert any issues.
